main event: A civilian observed a balloon-like object in the sky over Tempe, Arizona on March 8, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as swinging like a pendulum before it disappeared,The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes,The object changed color from reddish-orange to silver as it disappeared,No sound was recorded during the observation,The observer was a 35-year-old male, a trained observer with a background in entomology.
witness description: Civilian, 35-year-old male, retired Navy commander, trained observer in entomology.
